summary: The diff implements a comprehensive 3D trading education website with most requirements addressed. The backend Motoko actor is present with progress tracking, all four module pages are implemented, the navbar with glass-morphism is present, the 3D hero with React Three Fiber is implemented, 3D card navigation is present, and completion/progress features are wired up. However, the backend's data persistence across canister upgrades using stable storage appears unimplemented. A resetModule function was added to the backend that was not requested.

missing_requirements.reason: The Motoko actor uses Map.empty<Text, Bool>() which is heap memory and will be lost on canister upgrade. No stable var, stable storage, or preupgrade/postupgrade hooks are present in backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: resetModule function in the Motoko backend that resets a module's completion status to false
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked for markComplete (set to completed) and getProgress (retrieve statuses). A resetModule update call was not requested anywhere in the build request.
